Traits.Name: Martial advantage
Traits.Content: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if the creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that is not incapacitated.

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8+1) slashing damage

Actions.Name: Longbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8+1) piercing damage

Name: Skeleton
Languages: understands languages it knew in life but cannot speak

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage

Actions.Name: Shortbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage
